notes.title: Data availability
notes.p: The country emission budget allocation and reduction target results generated in this study have been deposited in a permanent public Github repository linked to Zenodo, accessible here: (10.5281/zenodo.6574309)58. Source data for all figures found in this work can also be obtained from the same repository. All source data for calculations are freely available from the EUROSTAT database (which can be found at: https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/data/database), with the exception of data on energy requirements for basic needs calculations, which were obtained from the authors of Kikstra et al.55 upon request.
